summary: A set of lightweight testing utilities that assist in managing temporary working directories, formatting console output, handling CSV files, retrieving .gitignore content, normalizing file paths, encapsulating test data, providing custom mock-call assertions, and extracting plot objects from nested test data structures.
business_intent: To streamline the development and execution of unit tests by offering reusable helpers that reduce boilerplate for file system setup, data handling, assertion verification, and visualization access within the test suite.
